title: ‘The Minutes’ Review: Meltdown at a Meeting
sub_head: Tracy Letts’s comedy-drama, about an increasingly odd city council gathering, finally opens on Broadway after being long delayed due to Covid-19.
body:
New York
Time was, city council meetings in minor American burgs were sleepy, if not downright soporific affairs. More recently, such meetings, as well as the potentially even snoozier school-board gatherings, have sometimes become miniature but fiercely contested battlegrounds in the country’s seemingly endless culture wars.
